attributes.action: Don't allow any exemptions to the European ban on neonicotinoids.
attributes.background: Neonicotinoids are insecticides that share a common mode of action that affect the central nervous system of insects, resulting in paralysis and death. Don't allow any exemptions to the European ban on neonicotinoids.

rejection.details: We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104796 You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
